content: counts as the first double_crochet 2dc in the same space 3dc into the next chain-2 space 23 times join to the top of the beginning chain-2 with a slip_stitch 72 double_crochet round 8 join with a new colour in any double_crochet ch1 this does not count as a st 1 single_crochet into each st join by working a slip_stitch into the beginning ch1 72 single_crochet round 9 join with a new colour in any single_crochet ch1 this does not count as a st 1 single_crochet into each st join by working a slip_stitch into the beginning ch1 72 single_crochet round 10 join with a new colour in any single_crochet make 1 cluster ch1 skip the next st and work 1 cluster into the next st chain 1 35 times join to the top of the first cluster with a slip_stitch 36 clusters 36 chain-1 spaces round 11 join with a new colour in chain-1 space make 1 cluster ch1 36 times join to the top of the first cluster with a slip_stitch 36 clusters 36 chain-1 spaces round 12 join with a new colour in any chain-1 space ch2 this counts as the first double_crochet 1 double_crochet in the same space 2dc in each chain-1 space 35 times join to the top of the beginning chain-2 with a slip_stitch 72 double_crochet row 13 join with a new colour in any double_crochet ch2 this counts as the first double_crochet double_crochet into each st join to the top of the beginning chain-2 with a slip_stitch 72 double_crochet row 14 join with a new colour in any double_crochet ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc into each st join to the top of the beginning chain-1 with a slip_stitch 72 single_crochet row 15 join with a new colour in any single_crochet ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc into each st join to the top of the beginning chain-1 with a slip_stitch 72 single_crochet round 16 join with a new colour in any single_crochet make 1 cluster ch1 skip the next st and work 1 cluster into the next st chain 1 35 times join to the top of the first cluster with a slip_stitch 36 clusters 36 chain-1 spaces round 17 join with a new colour in any chain-1 space make 1 cluster ch1 36 times join to the top of the first cluster with a slip_stitch 36 clusters 36 chain-1 spaces round 18 join with a new colour in any chain-1 space ch2 this counts as the first double_crochet 1 double_crochet in the same space 2dc in each chain-1 space 35 times join to the top of the beginning chain-2 with a slip_stitch 72 double_crochet rounds 19 and 20 join with a new colour in any double_crochet ch2 this counts as the first double_crochet double_crochet into each st join to the top of the beginning chain-2 with a slip_stitch 72 double_crochet rounds 21 - 25 turn the beanie so that you are now working on the inside
